description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国新闻工作者，中国共产党官员。
description.en: A Chinese journalist and an official of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家，范瑾的舅父。
description.en: Chinese historian, maternal uncle of Fan Jin.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期中国最高学府。
description.en: The highest institution of learning in China during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党创办的干部学校。
description.en: A cadre school established by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党天津市委员会的机关报。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Tianjin Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会的机关报。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Beijing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党北京市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在北京市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 1955年至1967年间北京市的政府机构。
description.en: The government body of Beijing from 1955 to 1967.

description.zh-cn: 由北京日报社主办的报纸。
description.en: A newspaper published by the Beijing Daily Group.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间在中华人民共和国发生的一场重大政治运动。
description.en: A major political movement that took place in the People's Republic of China from 1966 to 1976.

nodes.id: 北京市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 北京市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 北京市人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Beijing Municipal People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议北京市委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议北京市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在北京市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，乔冠华的原配妻子。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, the first wife of Qiao Guanhua.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 范瑾的父亲。
description.en: Father of Fan Jin.

description.zh-cn: 范瑾的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Fan Jin.

description.zh-cn: 范瑾的祖父。
description.en: Paternal grandfather of Fan Jin.

description.zh-cn: 范瑾的祖母。
description.en: Paternal grandmother of Fan Jin.

description.zh-cn: 范瑾的外祖父。
description.en: Maternal grandfather of Fan Jin.

description.zh-cn: 范瑾的叔祖父。
description.en: Paternal granduncle of Fan Jin.

description.zh-cn: 范瑾的妹妹。
description.en: Younger sister of Fan Jin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，范瑾的丈夫。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, husband of Fan Jin.

description.zh-cn: 黄敬与范瑾的长子。
description.en: Eldest son of Huang Jing and Fan Jin.

description.zh-cn: 黄敬与范瑾的次子。
description.en: Second son of Huang Jing and Fan Jin.

description.zh-cn: 黄敬与范瑾的三子，曾任中国共产党第十八届中央政治局常委、全国政协主席。
description.en: Third son of Huang Jing and Fan Jin, former member of the 18th Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China and Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 黄敬与范瑾的长女，在文化大革命期间自杀。
description.en: Eldest daughter of Huang Jing and Fan Jin, who committed suicide during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 黄敬与范瑾的次女。
description.en: Second daughter of Huang Jing and Fan Jin.

nodes.id: 北京师范大学附属女子中学

zh-cn: 北京师范大学附属女子中学

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所著名中学。
description.en: A famous high school located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 范瑾的曾祖父。
description.en: Paternal great-grandfather of Fan Jin.

description.zh-cn: 范瑾的外曾祖父，也是其外曾外祖父。
description.en: Maternal great-grandfather and also paternal-maternal great-grandfather of Fan Jin.

description.zh-cn: 范瑾是浙江绍兴人。
description.en: Fan Jin was born in Shaoxing, Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 范瑾是历史学家范文澜的甥女。
description.en: Fan Jin is the niece of historian Fan Wenlan.

degree.zh-cn: 实验学校, 理学院地质系
degree.en: Experimental School, Department of Geology, College of Science

description.zh-cn: 范瑾于1928年起在国立中央大学实验学校学习，1936年考入该校理学院地质系。
description.en: Fan Jin began studying at the Experimental School of National Central University in 1928 and was admitted to the Department of Geology in the College of Science in 1936.

description.zh-cn: 范瑾于1938年在延安加入中国共产党。
description.en: Fan Jin joined the Communist Party of China in Yan'an in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争爆发后，范瑾于1937年底赴延安，在陕北公学学习。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War, Fan Jin went to Yan'an at the end of 1937 to study at Shaanbei Public School.

position.en: Editorial Board Member, Deputy Editor-in-Chief, Editor-in-Chief

relationships.target: 中国共产党北京市委员会

position.en: Deputy Head of the Propaganda Department, Standing Committee Member

description.zh-cn: 在北京市任职期间，范瑾领导创办了《北京日报》等报刊。
description.en: During her tenure in Beijing, Fan Jin led the founding of newspapers such as the Beijing Daily.

description.zh-cn: 在北京市任职期间，范瑾领导创办了《北京晚报》等报刊。
description.en: During her tenure in Beijing, Fan Jin led the founding of newspapers such as the Beijing Evening News.

description.zh-cn: 1966年文化大革命爆发，范瑾随即被打倒。1968年被关进监狱，1975年获释并受到平反。
description.en: When the Cultural Revolution broke out in 1966, Fan Jin was immediately purged. She was imprisoned in 1968 and released and rehabilitated in 1975.

relationships.target: 北京市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 改革开放后，范瑾历任北京市人大常委会副主任。
description.en: After the Reform and Opening-up, Fan Jin served as Vice Chairwoman of the Standing Committee of the Beijing Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议北京市委员会

description.zh-cn: 改革开放后，范瑾历任北京市政协主席。
description.en: After the Reform and Opening-up, Fan Jin served as Chairwoman of the Beijing Municipal Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 范瑾与乔冠华原配妻子龚澎是好友。
description.en: Fan Jin was a good friend of Gong Peng, the first wife of Qiao Guanhua.

description.zh-cn: 1939年同范瑾在冀中根据地结婚。
description.en: Married Fan Jin in the Central Hebei Base Area in 1939.

relationships.target: 北京师范大学附属女子中学

description.zh-cn: 文革开始时为师大女附中高中生。
description.en: Was a high school student at the Girls' High School Attached to Beijing Normal University at the beginning of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 文革开始时，俞慧声在学校里遭到批斗，后患精神分裂症，最终自杀。
description.en: At the beginning of the Cultural Revolution, Yu Huisheng was persecuted at school, subsequently suffered from schizophrenia, and eventually committed suicide.
